title: Kangaroo Island Beachfront Eco-Glamping with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Swap the city for majestic landscapes, salt-licked beaches, incredible wildlife and gourmet wine scene at this deluxe glamping escape on Kangaroo Island. Constructed from only environmentally sustainable tents, each hideway is nestled in the native bushland and boasts direct access to Penneshaw Beach. 

Embrace tranquillity and nature in Kangaroo Island, where you may choose to trace the trails of the magnificent Flinders Chase National Park - home to the beautiful boulders of Remarkable Rocks - or visit the Seal Bay Conservation Park, where you can walk among endangered sea lions on the beach.
offer_address: 8 Frenchmans Terrace, Penneshaw, South Australia 5222, Australia

title: Kangaroo Island Seafront Glamping with Daily Breakfast & Drinks
description:
Experience nature without having to forgo home comforts amid Kangaroo Island’s serene beaches, stunning coastline and flourishing wildlife at Seafront Kangaroo Island. Take in the natural splendour of the Backstairs Passage while enjoying hot showers from the comfort of your eco-luxury tent.

Cheers to your escape with a local bottle of Kangaroo Island wine on arrival and enjoy glamping comfort a mere 300m from Hog Bay Beach and Sealink Ferry Terminal. Includes daily breakfast and a nightly drink per adult at the clifftop Penneshaw Hotel.
offer_address: 8 Frenchmans Terrace, Penneshaw, South Australia 5222, Australia

title: Romantic Off-Grid Kangaroo Island Eco Villas with Daily Gourmet Breakfast Hamper
description:
Immerse yourself in the stunning landscapes of Kangaroo Island with a front-row seat to one of the island's most coveted wilderness escapes, the off-grid Ecopia Retreat. A luxury hideaway surrounded by 150 acres of untouched flora with intimate eco villas that offer a unique nature experience in a curated setting, where you can drink in panoramic views and enjoy the company of local flora and fauna.

Powered by solar energy and a rainwater system with luxurious touches including a freestanding bathtub and a charming log wood fireplace, this private retreat - home to just two villas (and a residence) - invites you to discover the perfect balance between sustainable, eco-friendly living and romance. Tucked away within a dedicated wildlife sanctuary, you'll have exclusive access to Eleanor River and the unique opportunity to see a wide range of local critters in their natural habitat. When you're ready to explore beyond the property's acreage, head to the incredible Remarkable Rocks, make your way over to Admirals Arch, and take your beach towel to Emu Bay for a day on the white-sand beach.
offer_address: 563B Gregors Rd, Seddon, Kangaroo Island, SA 5223

title: Amazing Wilderness Escape on Kangaroo Island
description: Discover the beauty of Kangaroo Island, an amazing gourmet food, wine and wildlife destination off the coast of South Australia, at Sea Dragon Lodge, a stunning oceanfront retreat overlooking Pink Bay and mainland Australia. The private beach offers glistening turquoise waters and shimmering sand with the rhythmic lapping of the waves creating a peaceful atmosphere. While on Kangaroo Island you can indulge in local produce, visit award-winning cellar doors, explore natural rock formations and spot seals basking in the sun. All eco-villas and apartments include fully equipped kitchens and offer amazing ocean views from private decks - you might even wake up to wildlife on your doorstep! Includes a daily breakfast hamper and a bottle of wine on arrival.
offer_address: 2575 Cape Willoughby Road, Pink Bay, Kangaroo Island, South Australia, 5222, Australia

title: Kangaroo Island Oceanfront Escape with Two Island Tours, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Two-Course Dinner with Drinks
description:
Serene memories await at the peaceful Sea Dragon Kangaroo Island, a stunning oceanfront retreat overlooking Pink Bay. Set on 250 acres of coastline estate, this secluded hideaway includes private access to a pristine beach, where guests can safely swim or enjoy a sun-downer. Known as Australia's answer to the Galapagos, Kangaroo Island is home to an abundance of native Australian wildlife, and many species can be glimpsed from this harmonious spot. The property works with its natural surroundings, using elements that greatly minimise its environmental footprint.

This tranquil escape offers the perfect location to indulge in local gourmet produce, visit award-winning cellar doors, and spot kangaroos outside your window. Any road trip across the island will immediately give you a taste of the strong paddock-to-plate presence that has turned Kangaroo Island into a gourmet food-lovers paradise. Your hosts can do the work of planning for you, with bespoke tour experiences that combine gastronomic adventures with stunning national park scenery and incredible wildlife encounters.
offer_address: 2575 Cape Willoughby Road, Pink Bay, Kangaroo Island, South Australia, 5222, Australia

title: Tranquil Kangaroo Island Waterfront Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover Australia's answer to the Galapagos with a relaxing stay at this waterfront resort sandwiched between American River's tranquil coves and native bushland. Featuring well-appointed accommodation with gorgeous views and an award-winning restaurant that highlights the island's exceptional regional produce, this relaxing retreat has everything you need for a comfortable stay amid nature.

Stretch your legs along the surrounding nature trails, then retreat to spend winter evenings by the roaring fireplace with a delicious glass of local red wine. Perfectly positioned for exploring the island's highlights from Stokes Bay to Admiral Arch, Mercure Kangaroo Island Lodge is the ideal choice for those seeking an adventurous escape or an opportunity to unwind.
offer_address: 73 Scenic Drive, American River, Kangaroo Island, South Australia 5221, Australia

title: Kangaroo Island Oceanview Villas with Half-Day Tour, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Two-Course Dinner
description:
Bask in the serenity of Kangaroo Island during your stay at Sea Dragon Kangaroo Island, a stunning oceanfront retreat overlooking Pink Bay. Set on 250 acres of seafront estate, this tranquil hideaway extends onto a pristine, secluded beach where guests can safely swim, snorkel or enjoy a sun-downer.

With its incredible ocean views and amazing eco-friendly design, you won’t ever want to leave your inviting villa. Enjoy the comfort of dining within your villa with a kitchen, lounge area and dining area, then revel in the privacy afforded by the serene bush setting, allowing you to relax in your outdoor bath on the private deck, overlooking the ocean. While on Kangaroo Island, you can indulge in gourmet local produce, visit award-winning cellar doors, explore natural rock formations and spot seals basking in the sun. This is a truly once-in-a-lifetime getaway in one of Australia’s most pristine landscapes - and this back-to-nature experience will be one to remember.
offer_address: 2575 Cape Willoughby Road, Pink Bay, Kangaroo Island, South Australia 5222

title: Kangaroo Island Eco-Glamping 100m from the Beach with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Clifftop Drinks
description:
Swap the city for Kangaroo Island's majestic landscapes, salt-licked beaches, incredible wildlife and gourmet scene, with a one-of-a-kind eco-luxe glamping escape at Seafront Kangaroo Island - a beautiful adults-only coastal property nestled less than a one-hour ferry ride from South Australia's Cape Jervis. The property is perched on the edge of Penneshaw Esplanade, so you can wake up in your very own glamping tent just 100 metres from the beachfront - you might even spot a kangaroo or two playing around your campsite.

A destination for adventures and wildlife encounters, this 540km-long stretch of rugged coastline invites you to trace the trails of the magnificent Flinders Chase National Park - home to the beautiful boulders of Remarkable Rocks. Embark on a Kangaroo Island cruise or swim alongside wild dolphins (charges apply), or visit the Seal Bay Conservation Park, where you can walk among endangered sea lions on the beach.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Your day is off to a great start with made-to-order breakfast served at Kangaroo Island Seafront Hotel
- Celebrate your escape with a bottle of wine on arrival from a local winery (your choice of red or white)
- Round out each day with a nightly drink (glass of house wine, bubbles, tap beer or soft drink) per person at Penneshaw Hotel
offer_address: 8 Frenchmans Terrace, Penneshaw, South Australia 5222, Australia

title: Award-Winning Kangaroo Island Luxury Boutique Retreat with Self-Contained Villas & Local Breakfast Hampers
description:
Kangaroo Island’s rugged coastline and lush bushland provide the perfect backdrop for a romantic getaway. Escape the city's hustle and enjoy an elevated bush living experience at the award-winning Stowaway Kangaroo Island, where you and your partner can relax in one of four exclusive private villas. 

Each villa, nestled on the island’s northern side, offers stunning views - either of Stokes Bay Beach, voted Australia’s Best Beach in 2023 - or the serene Lathami Conservation Park.

From your private terrace, you can spot kangaroos and rare birds in their natural habitat, sip complimentary wine in the outdoor jacuzzi and end your day cozy by the sauna or fireplace. For the ultimate indulgence, enjoy a unique spa experience with in-villa couples’ massages, facials and full-body scrubs.
offer_address: 3923 North Coast Road, Cassini, South Australia 5223, Australia

title: Adults-Only Kangaroo Island Off-Grid Eco-Cabin with Ocean Views & Private Sauna
description:
Surround yourself with nature and disconnect in ultimate luxury with a Kangaroo Island stay that elevates eco-tourism to new heights. Light-filled, romantic and meticulously curated, each CABN X is carefully positioned with privacy in mind, offering captivating views over the rambling wilderness, and the waters of Antechamber Bay.

With a coffee machine, furnished deck with an outdoor bathtub, indoor gas fireplace, kitchenette and luxe in-cabin sauna - for your exclusive use - it has everything you need to soak up Kangaroo Island’s world-famous serenity.
offer_address: Cape Saint Albans, Willoughby, Kangaroo Island, South Australia 5222, Australia

title: Kangaroo Island Eco-Villa Luxury with Three-Course Nightly Dinner with Wine, Generously Provisioned Butler’s Pantry & One After-Dark Wildlife Experience
description:
Step off the grid and immerse yourself in coastal beauty, where iconic Australian wildlife abounds and gourmet produce floods your tastebuds; experience Kangaroo Island with a five-star stay at Oceanview Eco Villas - an intimate eco-retreat that places premium luxury and environmental impact at the top of its agenda.

Sprawled across 500-acres of geographically blessed real estate, this solar-powered oasis invites you to drink in vistas across Nepean Bay from your private deck - with the views only interrupted by the odd kangaroo, feast on a pantry stocked with flavoursome regional delights or cosy up by the fire while you watch the sun fade across the Redbank coastline. Take the chance to explore Australia's answer to the Galapagos from this luxurious launchpad; book a bespoke tour and take in the Island's top natural sights, churn through the dunes on a sandboard or spend a leisurely afternoon sipping gin at a renowned distillery.
offer_address: 31 Point Morrison Rd Nepean Bay SA 5223 Australia

title: Grand Opening: Adults-Only Kangaroo Island Off-Grid Eco-Cabin with Ocean Views & Private Sauna
description:
Surround yourself with nature and disconnect in ultimate luxury with a stay at CABN X Kangaroo Island, an adults-only biowood cabin concept that elevates eco-tourism to new heights. Light-filled, romantic and meticulously curated, each exclusive CABN X is carefully positioned with privacy in mind, offering captivating views over the rambling wilderness, white sandy beaches and the waters of Antechamber Bay. With a coffee machine, furnished deck with an outdoor bathtub, indoor gas fireplace, kitchenette and luxe in-cabin sauna - for your exclusive use only - it has everything you need to soak up Kangaroo Island’s world-famous serenity.

Spend your days exploring the island’s many treasures, including Cape Willoughby Lighthouse - South Australia’s oldest operational beacon. Return to moments of repose by the fireplace and drinks on the deck.

title: All-Inclusive Kangaroo Island Luxury Lodge with Gourmet Dining & Island-Inspired Spa
description: Frequently heralded as one of the world's top luxury lodges, Kangaroo Island's Southern Ocean Lodge has reopened with elevated luxuries, redefining the gold standard for experiential travel. Situated amidst vast geo- and biodiversity, the lodge's architectural design seamlessly melds with the natural landscape, providing breathtaking views of the rugged Southern Ocean from its exclusive cliffside perch. Whether you choose to admire the rolling Australian bushlands during a spa treatment, simply recline on the beach or venture into the wonders of Kangaroo Island and spot native wildlife on a Signature Experience, the refreshing sea spray is your companion. With coastal serenity and local bounty at your fingertips, wining and dining is a gourmet affair featuring artisan pastries in the morning and regional degustation in the evening, paired with famous South Australian varietals. This is access to the wild beauty of 'Australia's Galapagos' at its most immersive.
offer_address: Hanson Bay Road, Kingscote, SA 5223, Australia
